name: One Plate at a Time
description:
You work in a restaurant and are tasked with clearing the plates from the table and moving them to the table in the kitchen. You've been told to only carry One Plate at a Time so that you don't drop any but... well, your choice how you handle the task!

Submission for Trijam #165, developed in 3 hours.

Controls use the Left and Right arrow keys for movement and plate selection, and Enter/Space for selecting things. Gamepad may work, but untested.

Developed by Sofox, development of the entire game streamed on Twitch with a VOD of the stream available here for the next month: https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1458965342

Uses SFX by edwar64896 at https://freesound.org/people/edwar64896/sounds/381264/
